description:
Get it just right, on the first try. This high-precision digital pressure gauge works just as well on super low-pressure fat bikes as it does on skinny road tires. Updated version of this air-checker comes with a case for storage.

  • Swivel head fits Presta and Schrader valves
  • Maximum pressure is 144psi
  • Pressure can be displayed in bar or psi
  • Allows for pressure adjustment to the nearest psi
  • Backlit display and large digits make for easy reading
  • Uses a CR2032 battery
name: SKS Airchecker 2 Pressure Gauge
